Documentation

Learn how to build your website with boba!

Progress

Change the progress by using the CSS width property

Default 25%

Default 50%

Default 75%

Default 100%
<div class="progress">
    <div class="progress-bar" style="width:50%">
        Default at 50%
    </div>
</div>

Colors

Progress bars come in all colors
Red

Orange

Yellow

Green

Teal

Blue

Indigo

Purple

Pink

Black
<div class="progress">
    <div class="progress-bar red" style="width:50%">
        Red
    </div>
</div>

Sizes

Progress bars come in all sizes
Small

Default

Medium

Large
<div class="progress">
    <div class="progress-bar medium" style="width:50%">
        Red
    </div>
</div>

Styles

Progress bars can have different styles

Striped

Striped

Outlined

Outlined
<div class="progress">
    <div class="progress-bar striped" style="width:50%">
        Outlined
    </div>
</div>

Stacking

You can stack different progress bars
Music
Photos
Apps
<div class="progress">
    <div class="progress-bar red" style="width:10%">
        Music
    </div>
    <div class="progress-bar red" style="width:40%">
        Photos
    </div>
    <div class="progress-bar red" style="width:20%">
        Apps
    </div>
</div>

Combinations

You can combine them to create the progress bar you need
Red, Medium

Blue, Large, Striped

Pink, Outlined
Green, Striped
Purple
<div class="progress medium">
    <div class="progress-bar striped red" style="width:50%">
        Striped, Red, Medium
    </div>
</div>
